briefdescription.para: Execute an expression that returns a Result, extracting its value into the variable defined by lhs (or returning a Status on error).

detaileddescription.para: Example: Assigning to a new value: ARROW_ASSIGN_OR_RAISE(auto value, MaybeGetValue(arg));
Example: Assigning to an existing value: ValueType value; ARROW_ASSIGN_OR_RAISE(value, MaybeGetValue(arg));
WARNING: ARROW_ASSIGN_OR_RAISE expands into multiple statements; it cannot be used in a single statement (e.g. as the body of an if statement without {})!
